titles.title: Honoring the victims of the Cambodian genocide that took place from April 1975 to January 1979.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: 4/14/2011--Introduced. Honors the victims of the Cambodian genocide that took place beginning in April 1975 and ending in January 1979, and supports efforts to pursue justice for its victims.
